/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/talker.dir/src/cam_info_pub.cpp.o  -o /home/aswath/ros/devel/lib/caminfo/talker -rdynamic /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libcamera_info_manager.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_signals -lboost_filesystem /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librostime.so -lboost_date_time /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lconsole_bridge -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/indigo/lib
